title: Peter Norvig
snippet: Distinguished Education Fellow at Stanford HAI, Research Director at Google. Co-author of Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach, the leading AI textbook used in 1,500+ universities worldwide. peter@norvig.com / resume / github / medium / photo gallery / legacy homepage

title: Peter Norvig - Wikipedia
snippet: Peter Norvig (born 14 December 1956) is an American computer scientist and Distinguished Education Fellow at the Stanford Institute for Human-Centered AI. He previously served as a director of research and search quality at Google. Norvig is the co-author with Stuart J. Russell of the most ...

title: Peter Norvig
snippet: Peter Norvig is a Director of Research at Google Inc; previously he directed Google's core search algorithms group.

title: Peter Norvig - AI for Good
snippet: Peter Norvig is a Director of Research at Google Inc. Previously he was head of Google‚Äôs core search algorithms group, and of NASA Ames‚Äôs Computational Sciences Division, making him NASA‚Äôs senior computer scientist. He received the NASA Exceptional Achievement Award in 2001.
